title: MedImageInsight: An Open-Source Embedding Model for General Domain Medical Imaging

abstract: In this work, we present MedImageInsight, an open-source medical imaging embedding model. MedImageInsight is trained on medical images with associated text and labels across a diverse collection of domains, including X-Ray, CT, MRI …
